DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this randomized, double-blind and placebo-controlled study is to evaluate the specific role of injection of local anesthetic into the intra- vs. extraarticular tissues after toal knee arthroplasty.
DOC.brief_title: Local Anesthetics After Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.criteria: Able to give informed oral and written consent to participate Able to speak Danish Treatment with opioids Body Mass Index > 40
